data.text:
Blue Nova 5.2kWh Lithium-ion Battery (CATL – LifePO4) 8000 Cycles @ 80% DOD

USABLE POWER: (5.2kWh) 100% DOD

Blue Nova RacPower batteries are 48V system-compatible & have been designed for installation in 19” server cabinets. Developed specifically to support business and telecommunications industries, a single 5.2k Daily Use unit can supply a sustained 2000W load for a typical 2.5 hour load-shedding cycle.

Up to 9 x RacPower batteries can be connected in parallel for a total installed capacity of 46.8kWh. Both the Backup Power and Daily Use models include serial communication (CAN / RS485) functionality. This is an excellent quality battery with backup spares and technical support. This option is ideal for solar systems and backup power solutions.

Communication: Deye | Sunsynk, Victron, Schneider, Phocos, EAST & Various other inverter brands via CAN & RS485

SPECIFICATIONS

Capacity – 5.2Kwh / 100Ah / 51.2V

Standard charge current – 60A

Maximum continuous discharge current – 100A

8 000 cycles (at 25c) with 80% DoD

Modular design for system scalability

Built in BMS that protects the cells from abnormal temperature, current, voltage, Short circuit, SoC and SoH.

Operating Temperature > -20 to 55 degrees celsuis. (ideally 25 degrees C)

FINISHING:

Powder coated – Black

DIMENTIONS (mm):

Dimensions 442mm x 520mm x 178 (Rack design)

Weight 41kg

MOUNTING:

Rack Mount as well as wall mount options available

WARRANTY:

10 Years – Terms & Conditions apply.
